## Project: AI-Powered Resume & Job Application Platform

This project is a comprehensive full-stack platform with the following features:
- Frontend: React.js + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express.js (TypeScript)
- Database: MongoDB
- AI Features: Resume parsing, job matching, ATS optimization, sentiment analysis
- Blockchain: Ethereum/Polygon integration for verification
- File Storage: AWS S3/Cloudinary integration
